articles.title: Ukraine latest: Pope appeals to Russians on Ukraine in Easter message - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Russia nearly shot down U.K. plane near Crimea; Xi says 'political settlement' only way to end crisis
articles.content:
The war that began with Russia's invasion of Ukraine in February 2022 has passed a grim one-year milestone, with mounting military and civilian deaths.
